title: ExperienceEvent details for marketing
description: This mixin is used to capture information regarding marketing campaigns details related to an ExperienceEvent, including campaign group, campaign name, and tracking code.

xdm:marketing.title: Marketing
xdm:marketing.description: The information related to marketing activities that are active with the touchpoint.

xdm:externalCampaign.title: External Campaign
xdm:externalCampaign.description: A unique code that identifies each campaign & the channel. It can also contain date and type of the campaign.

xdm:internalCampaign.title: Internal Campaign
xdm:internalCampaign.description: A unique code that identifies each internal campaign & promo area. It can also contain date and type of the campaign.

xdm:productFindingMethod.title: Product Finding Method
xdm:productFindingMethod.description: How the user found a product immediately prior to viewing it. Allows a view of which finding methods were most effective for each product.
